nodes.text: Rys Deksha was an Imperial Moff of Anukara. In 0 ABY, Deksha hosted General Ivel Toshan for a public ceremony celebrating the opening of a munitions factory. Two members of a Partisan cell called the Dreamers, Sadori Vushan and Seyn Marana, the latter of whom was actually an Imperial spy of Inferno Squad, undertook a mission to destroy the factory. In the ensuing explosion, Deksha and Toshan were among the dead.
